title: Beautiful Vienna in 1906 in color! Schönes Wien im Jahr 1906 in Farbe! [AI enhanced & colorized]

sources.title: Beautiful Vienna in 1906 in color! Schönes Wien im Jahr 1906 in Farbe! [AI enhanced & colorized]
sources.description: Wonderful film footage of Vienna, the capital of Austria, well before both World Wars! The original B&W film has been motion-stabilized, slightly speed corrected, enhanced and colorized by means of sophisticated A.I. video software. The film takes us by tram through the streets of Vienna and shows many of its beautiful buildings. As of today, most of these buildings still exist. For more information, see the timeline below. Original Title: Eine Fahrt durch Wien / Vienne en Tramway. Music: Leimoti - Winter Waltz, Old Vienna and Waltz for Celia. Timeline (draft, please help to complete this): 00:00 Start of our tour through Vienna. 00:03 Parlament & Burgtheater 01:21 Wiener Staatsoper - Kärntner Ring 02:15 Kärntner Ring - Schwarzenbergplatz 02:46 Praterstern, Tegetthoff-Denkmal 03:30 Praterstern, Tegetthoff-Denkmal.
